ingredients: 1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, cut into 4 pieces
2 tablespoons golden syrup (such as lyles) or light corn syrup
2 2/3 cups premium ice cream (such as dulce de leche or banana), softened
9 ounces bittersweet chocolate (do not exceed 61% cacao), chopped
assorted decorations (such as chopped nuts, colored sprinkles, toffee bits, and cacao nibs)
even easier: make sandwiches with your favorite cookies and ice cream dip in the melted chocolate, then decorate

test-kitchen tip: if you use a soft ice cream (such as dulce de leche), the sandwiches can be served directly from the freezer if made with a firmer ice cream, theyll need to soften at room temperature for about ten minutes
